fme:item.fme:description: Highway 11, in both directions. There is a Provincial State of Emergency at Highway 11 border crossing. The road is closed. Travel advisory. Avoid non-essential traffic. Expect delays. Additional screening and checkpoints are in place. Travellers bound for Alaska must go through screening at one of three border crossings: Abbotsford-Huntington, Kingsgate, or Osoyoos. For more information visit GOV.BC.CA/COVID-19. Last updated Thu Jul 30 at 4:24 PM PDT. (DBC-16731)

fme:item.fme:description: 56 Street, in both directions. There is a Provincial State of Emergency at Point Roberts Border crossing near Delta. Travel Advisory. 56 Street in both directions. Avoid non-essential traffic. Expect delays. Additional screening and checkpoints are in place. Travellers bound for Alaska must go through screening at one of three border crossings: Abbotsford-Huntington, Kingsgate, or Osoyoos. For more information visit GOV.BC.CA/COVID-19. Last updated Thu Jul 30 at 4:29 PM PDT. (DBC-16727)
fme:item.fme:title: Other Roads - Both Directions - Incident

item.title: Other Roads - Both Directions - Incident
item.description: 56 Street, in both directions. There is a Provincial State of Emergency at Point Roberts Border crossing near Delta. Travel Advisory. 56 Street in both directions. Avoid non-essential traffic. Expect delays. Additional screening and checkpoints are in place. Travellers bound for Alaska must go through screening at one of three border crossings: Abbotsford-Huntington, Kingsgate, or Osoyoos. For more information visit GOV.BC.CA/COVID-19. Last updated Thu Jul 30 at 4:29 PM PDT. (DBC-16727)

fme:item.fme:description: Highway 91 Connector, in both directions. Construction work between 96th Street and Nordel Interchange. Until Wed Nov 30, 2022. Lane closures in both directions planned.
